general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are the critical stages. Water scarcity during these stages should be avoided. Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Apply sprinkler irrigation to bring down the heat effect.

advisory: Yellow stem borer management - Due to the rise in temperature, there are chances of an increase in stem borer infestation. Spray recommended insecticides.
Blast Disease Management - Spray recommended fungicides.
Early Shoot Borer management - Irrigate frequently to manage early shoot borer. Apply Fipronil at the time of first earthing up.
High temperature increases water requirement. Irrigate the crop appropriately and avoid stagnant water.
Apply Streptocyclin in the root zone if wilting occurs due to high temperatures.
Install pheromone traps for management. Spray neem-based or other recommended insecticides as needed.
Mulch coconut leaves around trees to reduce water loss.
Cover newly planted seedlings with paper caps during daytime.
Harvest fingerlings from shallow ponds if water temperature rises. Ensure sufficient water depth before introducing fingerlings.
